author: ghostonabicycle
title: Witchy Witch
review:
Here are my two cents about this set.

Pros

  • Some fairly good parts (from the purple tile to the silver studs to the yellow 2X4 slopes to all of the black corner slopes)
  • Nice little area inside for storing something small, when you remove the hat. (This is my presumption that it is meant as a storage space)
  • Instantly recognizable
  • Inexpensive (under 10 cents a piece)

Cons

  • 'Storage space' is very small, and if you put something inside you would see it through the eyes and mouth sections
  • The bottom of the Witches head is gray, and I'm not sure why.

In total, I like it. It's not very playable, being a large witch head, but It's a nice little display set to put up on a shelf, and I like standing it up next to the 8684-4 witch, though they look very different.
